name: add_dynamic_modifier
desc: Adds a dynamic modifier to the specified scope (the default scope is ROOT).

name: remove_dynamic_modifier
desc: Removes a dynamic modifier from the current scope.

name: force_update_dynamic_modifier
desc: Forces an update to the effects given by variables within dynamic modifiers.

name: set_global_flag
desc: Defines a global flag.

name: play_song
desc: Plays an audio track.

name: clr_global_flag
desc: Clears a defined global flag.

name: modify_global_flag
desc: Adds an integer value to a flag.

name: custom_effect_tooltip
desc: Displays a localized key in the effect tooltip.

name: custom_override_tooltip
desc: Executes the provided effects but with a custom tooltip suppressing all tooltips from all other effects inside this block.

name: effect_tooltip
desc: Displays the effects in the tooltip without executing them.

name: log
desc: Displays a string in the game.log file when executed.

name: save_event_target_as
desc: Saves the current scope as a key. Is cleared once execution ends.

name: save_global_event_target_as
desc: Saves the current scope as a key. Persists after execution until cleared via effect.

name: clear_global_event_target
desc: Clears a specific global event target.

name: clear_global_event_targets
desc: Clears all global event targets.

name: sound_effect
desc: Plays the specified sound once.

name: randomize_weather
desc: Randomizes the weather with the specified seed.

name: set_province_name
desc: Changes the specified province/victory point's name to the specified name.

name: reset_province_name
desc: Resets the specified province's name.

name: damage_units
desc: Damages units in the specified area.

name: create_entity
desc: Creates an entity.

name: destroy_entity
desc: Deletes an entity.

name: set_entity_movement
desc: Sets the position and rotation of an entity using two coordinates.

name: set_entity_position
desc: Sets the position of an existing entity.

name: set_entity_rotation
desc: Sets the currently-facing angle of an existing entity.

name: set_entity_scale
desc: Sets the size of an existing entity.

name: set_entity_animation
desc: Sets the animation of a specified entity.

name: build_railway
desc: Adds a railway level between two provinces or along a predefined path.

name: event_option_tooltip
desc: Shows the tooltip usually received for hovering over an event option with the specified name.

name: create_purchase_contract
desc: Creates a purchase contract with the specified parameters.

name: start_border_war
desc: Starts a border war for the specified attacker and defender.

name: set_border_war_data
desc: Sets the bonuses or penalties for the attacker and defender in an on-going border war.

name: cancel_border_war
desc: Cancels an on-going border war without a winner.

name: finalize_border_war
desc: Ends an on-going border war.

name: set_variable
desc: Sets a variable's value to the specified amount, creating it if not defined.

name: set_variable_to_random
desc: Sets a variable's value to a random amount between min and max.

name: clear_variable
desc: Clears the value from the memory entirely.

name: add_to_variable
desc: Increases a variable's value by the specified amount.

name: subtract_from_variable
desc: Decreases a variable's value by the specified amount.

name: multiply_variable
desc: Multiplies a variable's value by the specified amount.

name: divide_variable
desc: Divides a variable's value by the specified amount.

name: modulo_variable
desc: Makes the variable become the remainder of Euclidean division.

name: round_variable
desc: Rounds the variable towards the closest integer value.

name: clamp_variable
desc: Clamps the variable to ensure its value is between the two specified numbers.

name: career_profile_set_temp_playthrough_variable
desc: Sets a temporary variable to a value or another variable.

name: career_profile_set_temp_variable
desc: Sets a temporary variable to a value or another variable.

name: add_to_array
desc: Adds an element to the array either at the specified index, defaulting to the end otherwise.

name: remove_from_array
desc: Removes an element from the array with the specified value or index.

name: clear_array
desc: Clears the array, removing every element inside.

name: resize_array
desc: Resizes the array, removing or adding elements in the end if necessary.

name: find_highest_in_array
desc: Finds the largest value in the array and assigns its value and index to a temporary variable.

name: find_lowest_in_array
desc: Finds the smallest value in the array and assigns its value and index to a temporary variable.

name: set_country_flag
desc: Defines a country flag.

name: clr_country_flag
desc: Clears a defined country flag.

name: modify_country_flag
desc: Adds an integer value to a flag.

name: country_event
desc: Fires the specified event for the current country.

name: news_event
desc: Fires the specified news event for the current country.

name: set_cosmetic_tag
desc: Makes the current scope use the specified cosmetic tag, changing name and flag.

name: drop_cosmetic_tag
desc: Makes the current scope drop the current cosmetic tag they are using.

name: set_rule
desc: Toggles the special game rules for the current scope.

name: set_party_rule
desc: Toggles the special game rules for the current scope's political party.

name: add_relation_rule_override
desc: Toggles the special game rules for the current scope in diplomacy towards the specified country only.

name: remove_relation_rule_override
desc: Removes the toggle added with add_relation_rule_override.

name: scoped_sound_effect
desc: Plays the specified sound once only for the current country.

name: scoped_play_song
desc: Plays an audio track for the specified country only.

name: goto_province
desc: Moves the camera position over the specified province.

name: goto_state
desc: Moves the camera position over the specified state.

name: change_tag_from
desc: Switches the player to the current scope from the target scope.

name: reserve_dynamic_country
desc: Reserves the dynamic country, making sure that it does not get recycled for civil war.

name: force_update_map_mode
desc: Forcefully refreshes the specified mapmode for the player.

name: add_ai_strategy
desc: Sets an AI strategy for the current scope.

name: create_dynamic_country
desc: Creates a new dynamic country, akin to ones used in civil wars.

name: add_state_core
desc: Adds a core for the current scope to the specified state.

name: remove_state_core
desc: Removes the core of the current scope from the specified state.

name: set_capital
desc: Makes the specified state the current scope's capital state.

name: add_state_claim
desc: Adds a claim for the current scope on the specified state.

name: remove_state_claim
desc: Removes a claim of the current scope from the specified state.

name: set_state_owner
desc: Makes the current scope the owner of the specified state.

name: set_state_controller
desc: Makes the current scope the controller of the specified state.

name: add_contested_owner
desc: Adds a contested owner to a state.

name: remove_contested_owner
desc: Removes a contested owner to a state.

name: transfer_state
desc: Makes the current scope the owner and controller of the specified state.

name: set_province_controller
desc: Changes the controller of the specified province to the current scope.

name: add_political_power
desc: Adds the specified amount of political power to the current scope.

name: set_political_power
desc: Sets the specified amount of political power for the current scope.

name: add_stability
desc: Adds to the current stability value for the current scope.

name: set_stability
desc: Sets the current stability value for the current scope.

name: add_war_support
desc: Adds to the current war support value for the current scope.

name: set_war_support
desc: Sets the current war support value for the current scope.

name: add_command_power
desc: Adds the specified amount of command power to the current scope.

name: add_manpower
desc: Adds the specified amount of manpower to the current scope.

name: army_experience
desc: Adds the specified amount of army experience to the current scope.

name: navy_experience
desc: Adds the specified amount of navy experience to the current scope.

name: air_experience
desc: Adds the specified amount of air experience to the current scope.

name: set_politics
desc: Sets the political status of the country, including the ruling party and elections.

name: set_popularities
desc: Sets the political party popularities for the current scope.

name: add_popularity
desc: Adjusts the popularity for the specified party in the current scope.

name: set_political_party
desc: Sets the popularity for the specified political party in the current scope.

name: set_party_name
desc: Changes the name of the specified political party for the current scope.

name: hold_election
desc: Executes the events in the on_new_term_election on action for the current scope.

name: set_power_balance
desc: Sets a new balance of power or edits the existing one.

name: remove_power_balance
desc: Removes the balance of power in entirety.

name: add_power_balance_value
desc: Pushes the balance of power towards one side.

name: add_power_balance_modifier
desc: Applies a balance of power modifier.

name: remove_power_balance_modifier
desc: Cancels a balance of power modifier.

name: remove_all_power_balance_modifiers
desc: Cancels all balance of power modifiers.

name: set_power_balance_gfx
desc: Changes the appearance of one of the sides within the balance of power.

name: set_major
desc: Makes the current scope a major country.

name: create_faction
desc: Creates a faction with the specified name for the current scope.

name: add_to_faction
desc: Adds the target country to the faction of the current scope.

name: leave_faction
desc: Removes the current scope from the faction they are part of.

name: remove_from_faction
desc: Removes the specified scope from the faction led by the current scope.

name: dismantle_faction
desc: Dismantles the faction of the current scope.

name: set_faction_name
desc: Changes faction names.

name: set_faction_leader
desc: Sets the current country as the faction leader.

name: set_faction_spymaster
desc: Sets the current country as the faction spymaster.

name: release
desc: Releases the specified non-existent country as a free nation.

name: release_on_controlled
desc: Releases the specified non-existent country as a free nation within controlled states.

name: release_puppet
desc: Releases the specified non-existent country as a puppet.

name: release_puppet_on_controlled
desc: Releases the specified non-existent country as a puppet within controlled states.

name: release_autonomy
desc: Releases the specified non-existent country as a subject of the specified autonomy.

name: give_guarantee
desc: The current scope guarantees the target country.

name: give_military_access
desc: The current scope grants military access to the target country.

name: recall_attache
desc: Recalls the current scope's attaché from the specified country.

name: diplomatic_relation
desc: Used to define a diplomatic relation between the current scope and target scope country.

name: add_opinion_modifier
desc: The current scope gains the specified opinion modifier towards the target scope.

name: remove_opinion_modifier
desc: The current scope loses the specified opinion modifier towards the target scope.

name: reverse_add_opinion_modifier
desc: The target scope gains the specified opinion modifier towards the current scope.

name: add_relation_modifier
desc: The current scope gains the specified relation modifier towards the target scope.

name: remove_relation_modifier
desc: The current scope loses the specified relation modifier for towards the target scope.

name: add_collaboration
desc: Adds collaboration in TAG with the scoped country.

name: set_collaboration
desc: Sets the collaboration in TAG with the scoped country.

name: recall_volunteers_from
desc: Recalls volunteers sent to the specified country back to the current country.

name: set_occupation_law
desc: Sets the occupation law of the country.

name: set_occupation_law_where_available
desc: Sets the occupation law of the country where possible.

name: send_embargo
desc: Embargos the target country.

name: break_embargo
desc: Stops embargoing the target country.

name: give_market_access
desc: Opens market access between the two countries.

name: puppet
desc: Makes the specified country a subject of the current scope.

name: end_puppet
desc: Removes the subject status between the target and the current scope.

name: add_autonomy_ratio
desc: Adds a freedom score ratio modifier to the current scope.

name: add_autonomy_score
desc: Adds an exact freedom score modifier to the current scope.

name: set_autonomy
desc: Sets the autonomy level for the specified country, including independence.

name: add_legitimacy
desc: Adds legitimacy to a government in exile.

name: set_legitimacy
desc: Sets the legitimacy of governments in exile.

name: become_exiled_in
desc: Makes a country a government in exile in a set country.

name: end_exile
desc: Ends a government in exile.

name: add_threat
desc: Adjusts the level of World Tension.

name: add_named_threat
desc: Adjusts the level of World Tension and adds an entry in the World Tension tooltip.

name: annex_country
desc: Annex the specified country for the current scope.

name: add_to_war
desc: Forces the current scope to join the war of the specified ally against the specified enemy.

name: declare_war_on
desc: Makes the current scope declare war on the specified country with the specified wargoal.

name: white_peace
desc: Makes the current scope white peace the specified scope.

name: start_peace_conference
desc: Makes the current scope start a peace conference with the specified scope on the other side.

name: set_truce
desc: Makes the current scope truce with the specified scope.

name: create_wargoal
desc: Grants the current scope a wargoal against the specified country.

name: remove_wargoal
desc: Removes wargoals from the current scope to the specified country.

name: start_civil_war
desc: Starts a civil war for the current scope with the specified parameters.

name: add_civil_war_target
desc: Sets that the war between ROOT and TAG is a civil war.

name: remove_civil_war_target
desc: Removes the status of the war as a civil war between the pair of countries.

name: transfer_units_fraction
desc: Transfers a fraction of the military to a target.

name: add_nuclear_bombs
desc: Adds nuclear bomb to TAG's stockpile.

name: launch_nuke
desc: Nukes the specified province or a province in the needed state.

name: add_resource
desc: Adds the specified resource in the specified amount to the specified state.

name: create_import
desc: Creates an import for the current scope with the specified resource.

name: give_resource_rights
desc: Gives all the resources of a state to the target country.

name: remove_resource_rights
desc: Removes given resource rights.

name: add_fuel
desc: Adds fuel to the current country.

name: set_fuel
desc: Sets country's current fuel amount.

name: set_fuel_ratio
desc: Set country's current fuel ratio relative to its capacity.

name: add_offsite_building
desc: Adds an off-map building for the current scope that produces its effects without being present in a state.

name: modify_building_resources
desc: Modifies the resource output of the specified building for the current scope.

name: damage_building
desc: Damages a building in a targeted state or province.

name: load_focus_tree
desc: Loads a new focus tree for the current scope.

name: unlock_national_focus
desc: Bypasses the specified focus for the current scope.

name: complete_national_focus
desc: Completes the specified focus for the current scope.

name: uncomplete_national_focus
desc: Removes a focus from list of completed focus.

name: mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty
desc: Refreshes the focus tree for the specified country.

name: activate_shine_on_focus
desc: Activates the shine effect on the focus with the given id.

name: deactivate_shine_on_focus
desc: Deactivate the shine effect on the focus with the given id.

name: activate_decision
desc: Activates the specified decision for the current scope.

name: activate_targeted_decision
desc: Activates the specified targeted decision for the specified target.

name: remove_targeted_decision
desc: Removes the specified targeted decision for the current scope.

name: unlock_decision_tooltip
desc: Displays a special tooltip for the specified decision.

name: unlock_decision_category_tooltip
desc: Displays a special tooltip for the specified decision category.

name: add_days_remove
desc: Adds the number of days to the timer created by a decision's days_remove.

name: remove_decision
desc: Removes a decision without running remove_effect.

name: remove_decision_on_cooldown
desc: If the decision is on cooldown, it gets removed.

name: activate_mission
desc: Activates the specified mission for the current scope.

name: activate_mission_tooltip
desc: Displays a special tooltip for the specified mission.

name: remove_mission
desc: Removes the specified mission for the current scope.

name: add_days_mission_timeout
desc: Adds the number of days to the specified mission.

name: add_research_slot
desc: Adjusts the number of research slots the current scope has.

name: set_research_slots
desc: Sets the number of research slots the current scope has.

name: add_tech_bonus
desc: Grants a research bonus to the current scope with the specified parameters.

name: set_technology
desc: Grants the specified technology to the current scope.

name: add_to_tech_sharing_group
desc: Adds the current scope to the specified technology sharing group.

name: remove_from_tech_sharing_group
desc: Removes the current scope from the specified technology sharing group.

name: modify_tech_sharing_bonus
desc: Modifies the specified technology sharing group.

name: inherit_technology
desc: Makes the current country's researched technologies be copied from the specified country.

name: add_doctrine_cost_reduction
desc: Gives bonuses of reducing land doctrine cost to current scope.

name: mark_technology_tree_layout_dirty
desc: Forces the refresh of the hidden technologies for the scoped country.

name: add_ideas
desc: Adds the specified ideas to the current scope.

name: add_timed_idea
desc: Adds the specified ideas to the current scope for the specified number of days.

name: modify_timed_idea
desc: Extends or shortens the duration of the timed idea by the specified amount.

name: swap_ideas
desc: Switches two ideas with a tooltip displaying any modifier differences between them.

name: remove_ideas
desc: Removes the specified idea from the current scope.

name: remove_ideas_with_trait
desc: Removes all ideas for the current scope that use the specified trait.

name: show_ideas_tooltip
desc: Displays the specified idea in the tooltip for the current effect scope.

name: load_oob
desc: Loads the specified order of battle for the current scope.

name: division_template
desc: Creates and adds the specified division template to the current scope.

name: create_colonial_division_template
desc: Create a colonial division template for overlord/owner.

name: add_units_to_division_template
desc: Adds the specified brigades to first available slots of specified columns to the template.

name: set_division_template_lock
desc: Toggles the locked status on a division template for the current scope.

name: country_lock_all_division_template
desc: Locks all division templates for the current scope.

name: set_division_force_allow_recruiting
desc: Changes whether it's possible to recruit divisions of a locked template without unlocking the template.

name: set_division_template_cap
desc: Sets the cap of a division template.

name: clear_division_template_cap
desc: Clears the cap on the template, allowing it to have an unlimited amount of divisions.

name: delete_unit_template_and_units
desc: Deletes the specified division template and all units using it for the current scope.

name: delete_unit
desc: Deletes all units that meet the filters.

name: delete_units
desc: Deletes all units with a certain template.

name: create_railway_gun
desc: Creates a railway gun.

name: teleport_railway_guns_to_deploy_province
desc: Teleports all railway guns to the province where they get deployed.

name: add_unit_bonus
desc: Adds permanent subunit and subunit category bonuses for country.

name: set_equipment_fraction
desc: Reduces the overall equipment stockpile by the specified fraction.

name: add_equipment_to_stockpile
desc: Edits the equipment stockpile of the current scope.

name: send_equipment
desc: Sends the specified amount of equipment to the specified target.

name: send_equipment_fraction
desc: Sends the specified fraction of equipment to the specified target.

name: create_production_license
desc: Grants the specified country a license to produce the specified equipment from the current scope.

name: add_equipment_subsidy
desc: Creates an equipment subsidy on the international market.

name: add_cic
desc: Modifies the economic capacity bank on the international market.

name: create_equipment_variant
desc: Creates the specified equipment variant for the current scope.

name: add_equipment_production
desc: Starts a production line for the specified equipment for the current scope.

name: add_design_template_bonus
desc: Add free bonus design discount to given types with a set of uses.

name: add_equipment_bonus
desc: Adds the specified equipment bonuses to the country.

name: set_equipment_version_number
desc: Changes current version number for a given equipment type to N.

name: destroy_ships
desc: Destroys the specified type and amount of ships controlled by the current scope.

name: transfer_navy
desc: Transfers the current scope navy to the specified country.

name: transfer_ship
desc: Transfers the specified type of ship from the current scope to the specified country.

name: create_ship
desc: Create a ship from another country and assign it to the reserve fleet.

name: add_mines
desc: Add mines to a strategic region.

name: add_ace
desc: Adds an ace for the current scope.

name: create_intelligence_agency
desc: Creates an Intelligence Agency.

name: upgrade_intelligence_agency
desc: Unlocks an Intelligence Agency Upgrade.

name: add_decryption
desc: Adds decryption towards the target country.

name: add_intel
desc: Adds the specified amount of intel towards the specified country.

name: add_operation_token
desc: Adds an operation token towards the country.

name: remove_operation_token
desc: Removes an operation token from the country.

name: capture_operative
desc: Captures the specified operative.

name: create_operative_leader
desc: Creates an operative for the current scope with the specified attributes.

name: free_operative
desc: Frees the specifies operative.

name: free_random_operative
desc: Frees one random captured operative or all of them.

name: kill_operative
desc: Kills the targeted operative.

name: turn_operative
desc: Turns the targeted operative against their own country.

name: steal_random_tech_bonus
desc: Steals a random tech bonus from the specified country.

name: set_nationality
desc: Switches the specified character to the specified country.

name: retire_character
desc: Retires the character, removing every role they hold.

name: set_character_name
desc: Sets the new name for the target character.

name: character_list_tooltip
desc: Displays a list of every character meeting the specified limitation.

name: add_trait
desc: Adds the specified country leader trait to the character.

name: remove_trait
desc: Removes the specified trait from the character.

name: create_corps_commander
desc: Creates a commander for the current scope with the specified attributes.

name: create_field_marshal
desc: Creates a field marshal for the current scope with the specified attributes.

name: create_navy_leader
desc: Creates a naval leader for the current scope with the specified attributes.

name: remove_unit_leader
desc: Removes the specified unit leader by their legacy ID.

name: add_corps_commander_role
desc: Sets the specified character to also act as a corps commander.

name: add_field_marshal_role
desc: Sets the specified character to also act as a field marshal.

name: add_naval_commander_role
desc: Sets the specified character to also act as an admiral.

name: show_unit_leaders_tooltip
desc: Shows the name of the specified character as a tooltip.

name: create_country_leader
desc: Creates a country leader with specified attributes.

name: add_country_leader_role
desc: Sets the specified character to also act as a country leader.

name: promote_character
desc: Promotes a character to the leader of their political party.

name: remove_country_leader_role
desc: Removes a country leader role from a character.

name: kill_ideology_leader
desc: Kills the country leader of the designated ideology for the current scope.

name: retire_ideology_leader
desc: Retires and removes the country leader of the ideology party for the current scope.

name: kill_country_leader
desc: Kills the country leader for the current scope.

name: retire_country_leader
desc: Retires and removes the country leader as head of their party for the current scope.

name: set_country_leader_ideology
desc: Changes the country leader's government type for the current scope.

name: set_country_leader_description
desc: Changes the country leader's description.

name: set_country_leader_name
desc: Changes the country leader's name.

name: set_country_leader_portrait
desc: Changes the country leader's portrait.

name: add_country_leader_trait
desc: Adds the specified trait to the current country's country leader.

name: remove_country_leader_trait
desc: Removes the specified trait from the current scope's country leader.

name: swap_ruler_traits
desc: Swaps traits.

name: swap_country_leader_traits
desc: Swaps traits of the current character.

name: activate_advisor
desc: Hires an advisor, placing them into their respective slot.

name: deactivate_advisor
desc: Dismisses an advisor from their respective slot, leaving it empty.

name: add_advisor_role
desc: Sets the specified character to also act as an advisor.

name: remove_advisor_role
desc: Removes the specified advisor role from the character.

name: set_can_be_fired_in_advisor_role
desc: Changes the can_be_fired attribute of the advisor.

name: add_scientist_role
desc: Adds the scientist role to a character.

name: remove_scientist_role
desc: Remove the scientist role from a character.

name: generate_scientist_character
desc: Generate a new character with a scientist role and recruit it in the country in scope.

name: show_mio_tooltip
desc: Displays a tooltip that shows the name of the MIO and its initial trait.

name: unlock_military_industrial_organization_tooltip
desc: Display a tooltip saying the MIO is made available.

name: unlock_mio_policy_tooltip
desc: Displays a tooltip that says that the policy is made available.

name: add_mio_policy_cost
desc: Modifies the base cost of a MIO policy.

name: set_mio_policy_cost
desc: Modifies the base cost of a MIO policy.

name: add_mio_policy_cooldown
desc: Modifies the base length of a MIO policy cooldown.

name: set_mio_policy_cooldown
desc: Modifies the base length of a MIO policy cooldown.

name: complete_special_project
desc: Complete a special project for the country in scope.

name: add_breakthrough_points
desc: Add breakthrough points to one specialization or all for a country scope.

name: add_breakthrough_progress
desc: Add breakthrough progress to one specialization or all for a country scope.

name: career_profile_step_missiolini
desc: Step completed Mussolini missions by one for the career profile.

name: recruit_character
desc: Initially assigns the specified character to the current country.

name: generate_character
desc: Generates a character for current country.

name: set_oob
desc: Sets the order of battle to be used for the current country's divisions.

name: set_naval_oob
desc: Sets the naval order of battle to be used for the current country's divisions.

name: set_air_oob
desc: Sets the air order of battle to be used for the current country's divisions.

name: set_keyed_oob
desc: Sets the keyed order of battle to be used for the current country's divisions.

name: get_highest_scored_country_temp
desc: Calculates the highest scored country that is defined in a country scorer and sets it to a variable.

name: get_sorted_scored_countries_temp
desc: Calculates & sorts all countries in a country scorer and stores them and their scores in temp arrays.

name: get_supply_vehicles
desc: Sets a variable to the number of supply vehicles in stockpile or that are needed.

name: get_supply_vehicles_temp
desc: Sets a temp variable to the number of supply vehicles in stockpile or that are needed.

name: state_event
desc: Fires the specified event for the current state.

name: set_state_flag
desc: Defines a state flag.

name: clr_state_flag
desc: Clears a defined state flag.

name: modify_state_flag
desc: Adds an integer value to a flag.

name: set_state_name
desc: Changes the current state's name to the specified name.

name: reset_state_name
desc: Resets any changes to the current state's name.

name: add_claim_by
desc: Adds a claim for the specified country on the current scope.

name: remove_claim_by
desc: Removes a claim by the specified country on the current scope.

name: add_core_of
desc: Adds a core for the specified country on the current scope.

name: remove_core_of
desc: Removes a core for the specified country on the current scope.

name: set_demilitarized_zone
desc: Makes the current scope a demilitarized zone.

name: set_state_category
desc: Changes the current state category to the specified category.

name: add_state_modifier
desc: Adds a modifier to the current state.

name: set_border_war
desc: Enables Border War status for the current state.

name: create_unit
desc: Adds the specified division to the current state.

name: teleport_armies
desc: Teleports all armies in the specified state if the owner of the armies meets the condition.

name: add_province_modifier
desc: Adds a province modifier to the specified provinces in this state.

name: remove_province_modifier
desc: Removes a province modifier to the specified provinces in this state.

name: add_victory_points
desc: Adds victory points to a province.

name: set_victory_points
desc: Sets the number of victory point in a province.

name: set_state_province_controller
desc: Changes the controller of all provinces within that state controlled by countries that meet triggers.

name: transfer_state_to
desc: Sets owner and controller of the state to the given country.

name: set_state_owner_to
desc: Sets the owner of the state to the given country.

name: set_state_controller_to
desc: Sets the controller of the state to the given country.

name: add_extra_state_shared_building_slots
desc: Changes the number of shared building slots for the current state.

name: add_building_construction
desc: Starts construction in the current state for the specified building.

name: set_building_level
desc: Sets the specified building to the current state.

name: remove_building
desc: Removes the specified building in the current state.

name: construct_building_in_random_province
desc: Set building level in a random province of state scope.

name: add_compliance
desc: Adds compliance to the specified state.

name: add_resistance
desc: Adds resistance to the specified state.

name: add_resistance_target
desc: Increases resistance target in the specified state.

name: cancel_resistance
desc: Cancels resistance activity for the current state.

name: force_disable_resistance
desc: Disables resistance for the scoped state when the occupier is the specified country.

name: force_enable_resistance
desc: Enables resistance for the scoped state when the occupier is the specified country.

name: remove_resistance_target
desc: Removes a set resistance target increase in the specified state.

name: set_compliance
desc: Sets compliance in the specified state.

name: set_resistance
desc: Sets resistance in the specified state.

name: start_resistance
desc: Starts resistance in the specified state.

name: set_garrison_strength
desc: Sets the strength of the garrison in the specified state.

name: raid_reduce_project_progress_ratio
desc: Reduce progress to the special project in state.

name: set_character_flag
desc: Defines a character flag.

name: clr_character_flag
desc: Clears a character flag.

name: modify_character_flag
desc: Adds an integer value to a flag.

name: retire
desc: Retires the current character (removing them).

name: set_portraits
desc: Changes the specified portraits of a character.

name: add_scientist_level
desc: Add levels to a special project specialization for a scientist character in scope.

name: injure_scientist_for_days
desc: Injure a scientist for x amount of days to a scientist character in scope.

name: add_scientist_trait
desc: Add a trait to a scientist character in scope.

name: add_scientist_xp
desc: Add experience to a special project specialization for a scientist character in scope.

name: unit_leader_event
desc: Fires the specified event for the owner of the current unit leader.

name: set_unit_leader_flag
desc: Defines a unit leader flag.

name: clr_unit_leader_flag
desc: Clears a defined unit leader flag.

name: modify_unit_leader_flag
desc: Adds an integer value to a flag.

name: promote_leader
desc: Promotes the current unit leader to Field Marshal (if Commander).

name: demote_leader
desc: Demotes the current unit leader to Commander (if Field Marshal).

name: add_unit_leader_trait
desc: Adds the specified trait to the current unit leader.

name: remove_unit_leader_trait
desc: Removes the specified trait from the current unit leader.

name: add_random_trait
desc: Adds a random trait from the list to the character.

name: add_timed_unit_leader_trait
desc: Adds the specified trait to the current unit leader for the specified duration.

name: replace_unit_leader_trait
desc: Replaces unit leader traits.

name: remove_exile_tag
desc: Remove the exile tag on an army leader.

name: gain_xp
desc: Adds experience to the current unit leader.

name: remove_unit_leader
desc: Removes the current unit leader.

name: remove_unit_leader_role
desc: Removes every unit leader role from the character.

name: supply_units
desc: Adds the specified amount of hours of supply to troops led by the current unit leader.

name: add_max_trait
desc: Adds the specified amount of assignable trait slots to the current unit leader.

name: add_skill_level
desc: Adds skill to the current unit leader.

name: add_logistics
desc: Adds logistics skill to the current unit leader.

name: add_planning
desc: Adds planning skill to the current unit leader.

name: add_defense
desc: Adds defense skill to the current unit leader.

name: add_attack
desc: Adds attack skill to the current unit leader.

name: add_coordination
desc: Adds coordination skill to the current navy leader.

name: add_maneuver
desc: Adds maneuver skill to the current navy leader.

name: add_temporary_buff_to_units
desc: Adds the specified combat buff to the current unit leader.

name: add_nationality
desc: Adds the nationality to the current operative.

name: capture_operative
desc: Makes the current operative be captured by a specific country.

name: force_operative_leader_into_hiding
desc: Forces the current operative into hiding.

name: free_operative
desc: Frees the current operative.

name: harm_operative_leader
desc: Harms the current operative.

name: kill_operative
desc: Kills the current operative.

name: turn_operative
desc: Turns the current operative against their own country.

name: operative_leader_event
desc: Fires the specified event for the operative.

name: destroy_unit
desc: Destroys the currently-scoped division.

name: add_history_entry
desc: Creates an entry within the command history of a division.

name: change_division_template
desc: Changes the template of the division to the specified one.

name: add_random_valid_trait_from_unit
desc: Adds a random valid unit trait to a unit leader.

name: add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry
desc: Adds the specified medal to the latest entry within the unit's history.

name: add_divisional_commander_xp
desc: Adds the specified amount of experience to the divisional commander.

name: reseed_division_commander
desc: Re-randomises the division commander using the given seed.

name: set_unit_organization
desc: Changes the organisation of the unit.

name: add_mio_funds
desc: Adds funds to the MIO.

name: set_mio_funds
desc: Sets the funds of a MIO to the certain level.

name: add_mio_funds_gain_factor
desc: Changes the base multiplier to MIO's funds.

name: set_mio_funds_gain_factor
desc: Changes the base multiplier to MIO's funds.

name: add_mio_size
desc: Adds sizes to the MIO.

name: add_mio_size_up_requirement_factor
desc: Changes the base multiplier to the requirement to size up a MIO.

name: set_mio_size_up_requirement_factor
desc: Changes the base multiplier to the requirement to size up a MIO.

name: add_mio_task_capacity
desc: Changes the base maximum task capacity of the MIO.

name: set_mio_task_capacity
desc: Changes the base maximum task capacity of the MIO.

name: add_mio_research_bonus
desc: Changes the base research bonus of the MIO.

name: set_mio_research_bonus
desc: Changes the base research bonus of the MIO.

name: set_mio_name_key
desc: Changes the name of the MIO.

name: set_mio_icon
desc: Changes the MIO's icon.

name: add_mio_design_team_assign_cost
desc: Changes the base political power cost of the MIO to assign research.

name: set_mio_design_team_assign_cost
desc: Changes the base political power cost of the MIO to assign research.

name: add_mio_industrial_manufacturer_assign_cost
desc: Changes the base political power cost of the MIO to assign production lines.

name: set_mio_industrial_manufacturer_assign_cost
desc: Changes the base political power cost of the MIO to assign production lines.

name: add_mio_design_team_change_cost
desc: Changes the base experience cost of the MIO to assign to equipment by a percentage.

name: set_mio_design_team_change_cost
desc: Changes the base experience cost of the MIO to assign to equipment by a percentage.

name: unlock_mio_trait_tooltip
desc: Displays a tooltip that says that the trait is made available.

name: complete_mio_trait
desc: Completes the specified MIO trait.

name: set_mio_flag
desc: Defines a MIO flag.

name: clr_mio_flag
desc: Clears a defined MIO flag.

name: modify_mio_flag
desc: Adds an integer value to a flag.

name: cancel_purchase_contract
desc: Cancels the current purchase contract.

name: add_raid_history_entry
desc: Add history entry to a raid.

name: raid_add_unit_experience
desc: Will give experience to any type of unit assigned to the raid.

name: raid_damage_units
desc: Damage is applied to ground units while damage to plane is defined as the amount of planes lost.

name: add_project_progress_ratio
desc: Add progress to the project's prototype phase.

name: complete_prototype_reward_option
desc: Complete a prototype reward option for the project in scope.

name: set_project_flag
desc: Defines a project flag.

name: clr_project_flag
desc: Clears a defined project flag.

name: modify_project_flag
desc: Adds an integer value to a flag.

name: execute_operation_coordinated_strike
desc: All prepared Port Strike and Strategic Bombing in the target region will execute multiple times.
